caption.p: Flatbread samples as presented for sensory evaluation: top left, Sorghum-Peanut Meal-Okra (SPO); top right, SPO-Jalapeno; bottom left, SPO-Turmeric root and bottom right, SPO-Ginger-root. The panelists were instructed to use water as palate cleanser between samples consistently throughout the test and evaluate snacks individually and not on a relative rating.
